title: Rpcdaemon "method handler crashed" will make all requests failed
body:
#### System information

version: `2020.12.03`
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : `142e397`

#### Expected behavior
If one request's handler crashed, just respond to one error. Not make the next all requests failed.

#### Actual behaviour

All requests will fail during the next few seconds.

In Grafana, I found the private API count decrease to 0.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2486301/103079664-386c2f80-460f-11eb-8882-8fa71176d118.png)


#### Steps to reproduce the behavior

I don't' know which JSON-RPC request crashed the rpcdaemon. I will provide it if I find.
